item.title: 本周二，旧金山选民将对两项提案进行权衡。提案 E 将赋予警方更多权力，让他们可以使用监控摄像头和无人机；提案 F 将要求领取福利金的单身成年人接受吸毒筛查。
item.description:
San Francisco voters on Tuesday will be weighing in on two propositions. Proposition E would grant police more powers, giving them surveillance cameras and use of drones, and Proposition F would require single adults on welfare to be screened for drug use. pic.twitter.com/yEBAGoeefk

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 4, 2024
